usecases: Create content quickly and easily for blogs, social media, websites, and more
Generate copy for business bios, Facebook ads, product descriptions, emails, landing pages, YouTube descriptions, taglines, and more
Rewrite content for Facebook and Instagram captions, quotes, descriptions, marketing materials, or website content
Write long-form content such as blogs, articles, and books
Brainstorm, outline texts, and generate texts to overcome writer's block or lack of inspiration

customer_reviews.name: Martin Ingram
customer_reviews.review: I was just wanting to try AI writing out of curiosity to see if it could create a readable blog post without too much input from myself. I managed to create a 1000 word post that flowed and read well and only had to make a couple of adjustments to the AI copy.

customer_reviews.name: Vincent Ochieng
customer_reviews.review: The Ai writing tool is the best feature of Simplified. It's my ideal go-to tool when I need to generate content for my blog around specific topics.

customer_reviews.name: Robert Hidajat
customer_reviews.review: I love the AI writing feature. This is the reason I purchased this software even though I already have other media creation helpers like Canva and InVideo. I've been exploring and experimenting with this feature and it is a great tool to help develop ideas and speed up writing for blogs and podcast content.

customer_reviews.name: Dickens Honest
customer_reviews.review: So far, I have used the long-form content generator and I am very pleased. I used it to write something that required a personal perspective about a topic and the AI performed very well. I am yet to see other features such as the product description and ads.

customer_reviews.name: Charles Storm
customer_reviews.review: What I like best about Simplified is the combination of AI-driven marketing solutions all in one place. Plenty of competitors offer AI writing, for example, but this is the first and only solution I've seen that offers both copy and design together.

customer_reviews.name: Damilare Macaulay
customer_reviews.review: Over the past few years, I have been using different tools to manage my business and my client's businesses. A different tool for AI writing, a different tool for graphic designs, and a different tool for social media management. The fact that Simplified simplifies everything into one tool - and for free - just makes this so much cooler!

testimonials.comment: Jenni, the AI assistant for academic writing, just got BETTER and SMARTER.
I started with Jenni-who & Jenni-what. But now I can't write without Jenni. I love Jenni AI and am amazed to see how far Jenni has come. Kudos to Jenni.AI team
This one is a game changer, Doc, especially on that small matter of lacking words or writer's block. I am definitely introducing it to my students asap.
Copyai is alright but have you tried @whoisjenniai?
herramienta de auto completado de textos. Usando inteligencia artificial te permite escribir de manera rápida y mas eficiente (hay que revisar igual)
Jenni is perfect for writing research docs, SOPs, study projects presentations
